pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Package for Calculating Water Vapor Measures from Temperature and Relative Humidity // Vapor pressure, absolute humidity, specific humidity, and mixing ratio are commonly used water vapor measures in meteorology. This R package provides functions for calculating saturation vapor pressure (hPa), partial water vapor pressure (Pa), absolute humidity (kg/m^3), specific humidity (kg/kg), and mixing ratio (kg/kg) from temperature (K) and relative humidity (%).
